titles.title: Overtime Restoration Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the earned income tax credit to taxpayers who exceed 40 hours of wage work per week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/31/2008--Introduced. Overtime Restoration Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the earned income tax credit by a weekly overtime bonus for each week a taxpayer receives earned income for more than 40 hours of work.
